column8: Answer

column5: How Do I Login and Out of My Account?
column7: How Do I Login and Out of My Account?
column8:
Login: Click the Login link located at the top right hand corner of the page

If you are a returning customer, enter your email address and password under the heading "Returning Customer?".

Click Login to log into your account.

If you are a new customer, provide your email address in the email field and select "Create my Account".

Click Login to log into your account after the account is created.

Logout: There are two ways to log out of your account.

If you are logged in as a returning customer, click on the Not You? link or on the Logout link located in the top right corner of our homepage to go back to the login page..

Close your web browser window that is displaying the ATG Store webpage to automatically log out.

If you have lost your password, select the "forgot your password" link to retrieve your password.

ATG Store, and its affiliated Home store is an online retailer offering a wide variety of high-quality, brand-name merchandise at discount prices, including furniture, home decor, watches, jewelry, clothing, shoes, and accessories. We give customers an opportunity to shop for bargains conveniently, while offering manufacturers, distributors and other retailers an alternative sales channel.

ATG Store, Inc. ("ATG Store," "atg,", "Oracle", "ATG Home," "we," "us," or "our" as appropriate) has created the following Privacy and Security Policy to let you know what information we collect, why we collect it and to whom it may be disclosed.

This Privacy and Security Policy applies to the Commerce Reference Stores (the "Sites"). This Privacy and Security Policy also addresses our data security practices and the options you have to access and control personally identifiable and non-personally identifiable information.

Our Terms and Conditions govern this Privacy and Security Policy. To the extent there is a conflict between the terms of this Privacy and Security Policy and the Terms and Conditions, the Terms and Conditions shall govern.

We may periodically make changes to this Privacy and Security Policy. It is your responsibility to review this Privacy and Security Policy frequently and remain informed about any changes to it, so we encourage you to visit this page often.

 This Privacy and Security Policy supersedes any and all previous versions. Entering the Sites constitutes your acceptance and agreement to all terms contained in this Privacy and Security Policy. If you do not agree with the terms set forth in this Privacy and Security Policy, please do not enter the Sites.

Most orders arrive within the estimated delivery time of 5-10 business days.

Tracking information is not available for items that we ship through the store-front.

International orders do take longer, so keep that in mind on expected delivery dates.

What You Can Do Look for tracking information in your shipping confirmation email, or log into?My Account?and select Order Status. Use any tracking information you find to track your order.

Check with family members, neighbors, co-workers, a building manager, or others who may have accepted your order if you were not at home during a delivery attempt. In your absence, the delivery carrier may have placed your order somewhere near your door, but out of plain view.

 Look for your order in out-of-the-way places such as a back door, garage, or behind bushes.

If you still cannot locate your past-due order after following the steps above contact Customer Care for assistance.

You will find an Apparel Size Picker on the product page for all apparel items. We strongly encourage you to review the sizing guide for recommended body measurements for the size you are considering. 

Modern size apparel is contemporary in style and the overall cut is smaller. The German sizing guide converts German sizes into U.S. sizes. Please refer to the item's product page to see what sizing chart is appropriate for your specific item.
Due to manufacturer packaging changes, product packaging may vary from the image shown for the clothing item that you have chosen.

What is an Oversized Item?

  • An Oversized Item is a large product that ships through freight carriers.
  • All Oversized Items must meet one or more of the following criteria:
    • Weigh 151 lbs. or more when packaged.
    • Length measures 108 in. or more.
    • Girth measures 165 in. or more.
    • If an item ships on a wooden pallet, regardless of weight (but generally in the 100-150 lb. range), it is considered an Oversized Item.

Return Policy

  • We inspect all Oversized Item returns upon their arrival back at our warehouse.
  • We may give only a partial refund of the purchase price if the returned item is not in its new, original and unopened condition. The amount of the partial refund depends on the condition of the item as determined in our sole discretion.
  • We reserve the right to deduct the original shipping charge, and the actual return shipping fee, which generally ranges from $100 to $695 or more (depending on size and weight), if the item is not in its original condition upon arrival back at our warehouse.

Additionally, you will be responsible to pay the original shipping fee, and return shipping fee if we receive an Oversized Item return for any of the following reasons:

  • You refuse a delivery without inspection
  • You miss a delivery appointment
  • You return a non-defective or undamaged product

Please contact Customer Care immediately to set up a return.

*By purchasing an oversized product, you authorize us to assess additional fees to your credit card as necessary according to the fee schedule described here. We may deduct original and return shipping costs from your refund or otherwise charge them to your credit card after we receive the return product back at our warehouse.

Follow the steps below to return an item.

  1. Find the order that contains the item you want to return.
  2. Select the item you want to return.
  3. Select the Return Qty you are returning.
  4. Click "Continue."
  5. Follow and complete the online instructions.

After you complete the above steps, we will send you, via email, a return shipping label with instructions and drop-off locations. Print the label and affix it to your package.

How do I know my own shoe size?

If you are unsure of your shoe size, try to use a ruler to get an approximate measurement. However, because the foot is three dimensional, this may not be a completely accurate measurement. Please keep in mind that manufacturers use different measures to construct their shoes and sizing may vary accordingly. Our recommendation is to try on a few shoes in an actual brick and mortar store to get an idea of what your size is.
Due to manufacturer packaging changes, product packaging may vary from the image shown for the shoe style that you have chosen.

column5: How to View Your Order History
column8:
You can only view your account history if you have registered on our site. If you are a registered user, you can view and manage your account and order information. Log into "Account" (located at the top right hand corner of the Home Page). You can manage your profile, payment information, address book, orders, wishlist and gift lists from the account management page.

Please Note: International orders may not appear in your order history for up to 5 days. Internationally shipped orders will not show tracking information until your item(s) leave the U.S. hub. Items may take up to 10 business days to reach the U.S. hub.

Tips for Searching


Our search feature makes finding exactly what you are looking for a breeze!

Follow steps below to perform a search:

  1. The search box is typically located in the top right-hand corner of the page.
  2. Type in a product name (such as Sweden End Table) and hit the enter key.
  3. Items matching your search words will display.
  4. To narrow your search further, select a listing under “Price” “Size” or “Color” and hit the enter key.

Tips for Browsing


  1. To browse through the product catalog/categories, hover over and select an item from the top navigation bar. 
  2. Using the dropdown menu, select a specific sub-category.

  2. Using the dropdown menu, select a specific sub-category.

Tips for Searching


Our search feature makes finding exactly what you are looking for a breeze!

Follow steps below to perform a search:

  1. The search box is typically located in the top right-hand corner of the page.
  2. Type in a product name (such as Sweden End Table) and hit the enter key.
  3. Items matching your search words will display.
  4. To narrow your search further, select a listing under “Price” “Size” or “Color” and hit the enter key.

  2. Using the dropdown menu, select a specific sub-category.

We inspect all returned items when they arrive at our processing facility. We refund the full cost of the merchandise and all original shipping charges if your return is a result of our error or defective product.

If the return is not a result of our error and you initiate a return of an unopened item within 90 days of original purchase date, we refund the full cost of the merchandise minus the original shipping charge and actual return shipping fees.

If you return an item that has been opened or shows signs of wear, we will issue a partial refund minus both original shipping charge and return shipping fees. Returns are not possible 90 days after original purchase.

You can expect your refund within four weeks of shipping your package back to us. In many cases you will receive a refund sooner, but we estimate four weeks because of the time required for return shipping (up to 14 days), product inspection at our returns facility (up to 5 business days), and processing from your bank or credit card company (up to 5 business days). We will notify you via email with the details of your refund, and we issue refunds in the form of payment used to make your purchase.

column5: What Payment Methods Do You Accept?
column7: What Payment Methods Do You Accept?
column8:
We accept the following methods of payment:

Credit card: Visa, MasterCard, Discover and American Express.

  • ATG Store Credit.
  • We do not accept:
    Credit Cards issued by a foreign bank or with a foreign billing address.
    Money Orders, Checks, Cash on delivery (COD), Debit Cards, Gift Cards or Paypal or any other payment method not listed above.

Please Note: Upon order submission, your credit card is charged.

Before Shopping: Click on the Login link located at the top of the  homepage. Under the heading New Customer, enter your email address and click on "Create My Account". Create and confirm your password and enter name and other optional details. Click "Create My Account" again to complete your account set up.

During the Checkout Process: From your shopping cart, click the "Continue Checkout" button. Under the heading New Customer enter your email address. Create and confirm your password. Click "Create My Account" again to complete your account set up.

column5: Product Information for Home Furnishings / Accessories
column8:
Following is general information about taking care of your Home Furnishing/Accessories that you purchase from the ATG Store:

  • Clocks 
  • Radios 
  • Cushions & Pillows
  • Glassware
  • Lamps & Lighting
  • Decor

Clocks

  • Clocks are delicate items and cleaning should be confined to the exterior of the clock case.  

Radios

  • Radios are not “waterproof”. Use a soft, dry cloth to clean your radio.

Cushions & Pillows

  • Follow your manufacturers instructions for cleaning the pillows and cushions. Not all items are machine washable and may require dry cleaning.

Glassware

  • Most glassware is fragile. We recommend that you hand-wash the glassware that you purchase from the ATG Store.

Lamps & Lighting

  • Bulbs are not included in the lamps packaging from the ATG Store. You need to purchase the bulbs separately and ensure that you follow the manufacturers instructions for purchasing the right type of bulb.

Decor

  • Follow the manufacturers instructions for taking care of the decorative items you purchase from the ATG Store.

Standard Shipping:

ATG Store & ATG Home offers various shipping methods and each one comes with its own associated price. Shipping applies to most destinations within the contiguous United States (excluding Hawaii and Alaska)

Orders ship within 1-3 business days and should arrive within 5-10 business days.

We use all major mail carriers, including UPS, FedEx, and the United States Postal Service. Customers cannot specify the carrier of their choice.

Alaska and Hawaii Shipping:

Due to carrier restrictions, we cannot ship some items to Alaska and Hawaii.

APO/FPO Shipping:

APO/FPO/DPO(Army Post Office/Fleet Post Office/Diplomatic Post Office)addresses are for U.S. military/government personnel stationed overseas.

We usually deliver these orders to the US military post office within 5-10 business days.

P.O. Box Shipping:

If we cannot ship an item to a P.O. Box, we will ask you to provide a physical shipping address.

Expedited shipping is not available for items shipped to P.O. boxes or APO/FPO addresses.

International and US Territory Shipping:

We are continually expanding our shipping services to additional countries.

Some products may not be eligible for international shipping.

ATG Store customers cannot ship to international destinations at this time.

We do not currently ship to US Territories.

Shipping and Delivery Information

Fragile items leave our warehouse within 1-10 business days.

We cannot ship fragile items to rural routes, Hawaii and Alaska, APO/FPO addresses, or P.O. boxes.

If we can arrange to deliver fragile items to a remote or isolated area not commonly serviced by freight carriers, delivery may take an additional 1-2 weeks and may incur a fee.

Fragile items arrive directly to your shipping address via a freight carrier.

The carrier will use the phone numbers you provide during checkout to contact you 24-48 hours prior to delivery to arrange a delivery time. (Available delivery times vary depending on the freight carrier's schedule.)

Our freight carriers provide fragile standard delivery service unless a "White Glove Delivery" notation is on the product page

Delivery time for most fragile items is 1-6 weeks from the shipping date.

Inspect the delivery carton for any damage, crushing, dents, creasing, etc. before signing the delivery receipt.

The carrier driver will not wait as you unpack and inspect the item unless there is visible damage to the package.

When you sign the delivery receipt, the driver will leave.

Shipment Damage

If you see obvious damage to your shipment carton, you may ask the driver to open the carton and inspect the contents with you.

If upon inspection you find damage, you may refuse the shipment and write, "Refused, due to damage" on the delivery receipt. Keep a copy of the delivery receipt with your damage notations and contact Customer Care immediately.

Keep all packaging materials for 30 days to use in a return in case you discover damage or defects after delivery.

If you discover damage or a defect after delivery, contact Customer Care. We will work to resolve the issue and, in our sole discretion, we may:

Arrange a repair or replacement if an item falls under a manufacturer's warranty;

Arrange for and pay the cost for repair of an item that does not fall under a manufacturer's warranty;

Issue a replacement; or Authorize a return

Delivery sites

Carriers deliver most fragile items only to the nearest ground-level entrance of your home, business, or residence.

Exceptions to the above policy include apartments, unusual driveways, or any other obstacles that impede delivery.

• Prices and availability of products on our Site are subject to change without notice.
  • All sales items are available only during the specified time-period, while they last, and under the specified terms.
  • Promotional sales may end with or without notice.
  • Upon termination of the sale or promotion, we are under no obligation, express or implied, to extend promotional sales terms or pricing.

Pricing Errors

  • We correct pricing errors when we discover them.
  • Incorrect prices sometimes appear on our Site, despite our best efforts.
  • We normally verify prices as part of our dispatch procedures.
  • When the correct price of a product is less than our stated price, we charge the lower amount when dispatching the product to you.
  • When the correct price of a product is higher than our stated price, at our discretion, we will contact you for instructions before dispatching the order, or reject the order and notify you of such rejection.
  • If a pricing error is reasonably obvious and unmistakable, we are under no obligation to provide the product to you at the incorrect (lower) price, even after we send you an Order Confirmation or Shipping Confirmation.

  • If a pricing error is reasonably obvious and unmistakable, we are under no obligation to provide the product to you at the incorrect (lower) price, even after we send you an Order Confirmation or Shipping Confirmation.

  • All sales items are available only during the specified time-period, while they last, and under the specified terms.
  • Promotional sales may end with or without notice.
  • Upon termination of the sale or promotion, we are under no obligation, express or implied, to extend promotional sales terms or pricing.

Pricing Errors

  • We correct pricing errors when we discover them.
  • Incorrect prices sometimes appear on our Site, despite our best efforts.
  • We normally verify prices as part of our dispatch procedures.
  • When the correct price of a product is less than our stated price, we charge the lower amount when dispatching the product to you.
  • When the correct price of a product is higher than our stated price, at our discretion, we will contact you for instructions before dispatching the order, or reject the order and notify you of such rejection.

column7: Return policy for personal accessories (Wallets, Scarves, Jewelry etc)
column8:
Please note that although we allow no-hassle returns for personal fit items (clothing etc), we have restrictions on returns for items that provide an adjustable fit or are provided in a fixed standard size.

At the time of writing, this includes the following items:

  • Watches
  • Jewelry
  • Scarves
  • Purses
  • Briefcases
  • Wallets

The restrictions on returns for these items are that the item will only be accepted in return (for a full refund - a 20% re-stocking fee) if the item is returned in its original packaging and/or with product tags intact.

• You cannot change your order after submitting it.
  • You can place a different order if you cancel the original one.
  • There is a short timeframe before your order reaches our warehouse for processing. You can cancel your order during that timeframe.
  • If you cancel your order, contact your financial institution for your refund posting timeframe.

Please view our article on How to Cancel an Order for more information.
